item.description:
Join us for a fun day of apple picking at Berlin Orchards. [:)] There is a short hayride (free) to the apple orchards. Enjoy the fresh air and variety of apples. We will meet near the entrance where you purchase apple picking bags. $15 - a peck (10 lbs) (can be shared with another person) $25 - 1/2 a bushel (20 lbs)

Free parking, no entrance fee [b]Transportation is your own responsibility.[/b] However, we will try to arrange carpools for you if possible. If you need a ride or can provide a ride, please indicate when you RSVP. Let us know what city/town and/or T stop you are at. Members may contact each other re: carpools. Berlin Orchards is about 40 miles from Boston.

Drive Directions: Please visit this site http://www.berlinorchards.com/directions.html

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Apple Picking - Saturday
